definition: peerless/unmatched in his generation/incomparable (talent, beauty)
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
variant of 絕|绝[jue2]
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
beauty unmatched in her generation (idiom); woman of peerless elegance/prettiest girl ever
to be blessed with rare and radiant beauty (idiom)
magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent

sentences.english: Maybe we shall have a daughter who will be the loveliest woman ever seen among men.
sentences.chinese: 也许我们会生一个女儿，她会成为绝代佳人。

sentences.english: " It is a real miracle that "Yellow Crane Tower" made the unparalleled poet Li Bai crown it as the best.
sentences.chinese: 一首《黄鹤楼》竟让绝代诗仙称首，实在是一个奇迹。
精美的壁画，堪称绝代佳品。

sentences.english: The young, the all-beautiful Ione, is seated by that rude fire.
sentences.chinese: 年轻的绝代美人伊俄涅坐在粗陋的火炉旁。

sentences.english: Isabella is one of the most beautiful characters in the pages of history.
sentences.chinese: 伊莎贝拉是史篇中的绝代佳人之一。

sentences.english: I see descriptions of the fairest wights.
sentences.chinese: 发见那绝代风流人物的写真。

definition: unique/exceptional
magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent
beauty unmatched in her generation (idiom); woman of peerless elegance/prettiest girl ever
a woman of unmatched beauty (idiom)
(of a woman) remarkably beautiful/stunning
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful
unrivalled/matchless
incomparable/matchless/unique
looks/appearance
divine fragrance, national grace (idiom); an outstanding beauty
good looks/good figure/graceful bearing/charm
outstanding/peerless/beyond compare
rarity/rare object/rare person/extraordinarily beautiful woman
incomparable/none to compare with at that time
the present age/in office/the current office holder
